gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 129, Bulls 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Bulls, 129-112. Derrick White led the way with 28 points (5-10 3PM), five assists, and three blocks for the Celtics, with Jayson Tatum adding 25 points, seven rebounds, and five assists in the victory. Nikola Vucevic tallied 22 points and 14 rebounds for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Celtics have won 7 in a row and improve to 44-12, while the Bulls fall to 26-30.
